title: No Apps, No Data, No AI Philosophy
summary: AI only creates value when deeply embedded in business processes—the formula is apps + data + AI, without the first two the third delivers limited value

content.whatItIs: SAP CEO Christian Klein's distinctive AI philosophy challenges standalone AI tools: 'For high-value AI cases in B2B, a Large Language Model alone is not sufficient. No apps, no data, no AI.'
howItWorks: Three-pillar architecture: modern cloud software + modern data management + consistent AI stack linking them
AI must be deeply embedded in business processes—not standalone technology
Prediction: Within 2 years, SAP users will no longer manually enter data; all tasks processed with natural language
Joule (SAP's AI copilot) delivers minimum 30-40% productivity increase
Real results: Johnson Controls (3,000 hours/year saved), Bosch (2,500 hours/service center/year), JK Cement (50% faster purchasing)
content.coreInsight: AI success requires deep integration into business processes, not standalone tools. The formula is 'apps + data + AI'—without the first two, the third delivers limited value. For enterprise software companies, AI accelerates cloud migration as customers want AI capabilities now.
content.keyMetrics: Q4 2025: RISE deals pulled forward because customers want SAP Business AI. EU AI Cloud launched with sovereign data guarantees. TIME Davos 2026: 'Intelligent Age' operating model.
